entry.title: Book 1: The Triskele / Book 2: The Mischief / Book 3(A/B): The Triskele and the Mischief
entry.summary:
Author: Solinvictus22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 79,842Chapters: 32/?Kudos: 27

Summary: (FIXED AND EDITED; UNTIL CHAPTER 30)Trilogy wrapped into one:Book 1: Nemes(plural, pronounced nim/s) are people naturally born with connection to the primordial energies of the Earth enabling them to cast magic, Stiles is born a Neme and so is the prince he guards, while they have the war on their heads, against Neme-hunters of Edenia, humans who unlocked the science that may end the age of magic users.Book 2: Stiles' life turned upside down after engaging himself with dark magic, unknowingly the consequence of his actions weights more dreadful than just losing his light magic: the birth of the MischiefBook 3A: With the royalties and soldier mages reunited, they must finally face their greatest common enemy, Deucalion and his cult.Book 3B: Argesh has distracted itself by its inner conflict, Edenia has hibernated long enough to reinforce their anti magic tech to swoop the magical kingdoms with its storm.

entry.title: A Gentleman's Liaisons
entry.summary:
Author: house_of_lantis

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,732Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Peter Hale, the Duke of Beacon Hills, was content to live his life as a gentleman of leisure and an utter scoundrel, courting every pleasure available…but, he was bored. He needed a new challenge. He needed a new rival, an opponent who had the same access and skills to the playground. Chris Argent was born a gentleman who liked to get his hands dirty. But will he fall for Peter’s games or start one of his own?

entry.title: Unveiled
entry.summary:
Author: Dexterous_Sinistrous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,875Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 441

Summary: Stiles’ hands were shaking as he took a handful of his veil, though he wished he could act bravely and just tear the material off. He slowly began to lift the veil, his heartbeat racing as he continued to look at the Alpha through the material.'There isn’t another way', Stiles reassured himself.His veil felt heavier than it should as he lifted it over his chin.Calloused hands grasped Stiles’ wrists in a tight hold.Stiles was startled, his actions halted. His veil was hanging just below his lips as he observed the Alpha.~*~Or, can love blossom while hidden by a veil?

entry.title: the bite is a gift
entry.summary:
Author: blueinkedbones

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,878Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: Derek’s half-dead by the time Mom’s satisfied with his responses. For this time, at least. Somehow, every full moon is different. But he’s healing, that’s what’s important. That, and that it’ll be almost a month before he has another night like this. But that’s just part of being a born wolf, a Hale descendant. You have to be strong, and ready.Mom doesn’t believe in doing anything halfway.The anger and adrenaline gets Derek as far as Stiles’ house before exhaustion and pain take over. He manages a few dragging steps forward, only just grabbing the doorknob in time to keep himself from collapsing right there on the front porch.But Stiles already knows, somehow, even with human hearing. That, or Derek’s attempt at a subtle escape was a lot louder than he realized.“Derek? Oh my god.”

entry.title: if couches could talk
entry.summary:
Author: seaweedwater

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,667Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 11

Summary: Derek watched Stiles grow into the young man he is now—smart, funny, kind, exceptional, truly gorgeous. He could easily find someone his age who would give him the time of day, but he doesn’t seem interested in a relationship, or anything that could distract him from pining for Derek’s notice.Derek would be lying if he said he didn’t like the attention. He’s careful with it, careful not to indulge him and lead him on, to take advantage, because there’s nothing that could ever happen between them. He’s a child, his son’s best friend, the son of a Sheriff who has a gun rack, and Derek is thirty-six and unhappily married with taxes to pay and a house to maintain.It’s just a fantasy, something Derek lets his mind play with since he knows nothing could ever come of it. If he imagines Stiles’ fingers inside him instead of his own, it’s not like anyone else could ever know that.

entry.title: DON’T DIE, DUMBASS
entry.summary:
Author: Noctirax

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,981Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 38

Summary: Stiles was certain—utterly certain—there had been someone in the middle of the road. Sure, the figure had moved with an unnatural quickness, vanishing as suddenly as he appeared but that didn't mean anything. Just standard Beacon Hills bullshit—home to the strange and unexplained. No, that wasn't what bothered him. What bothered him was that he hadn’t just seen someone. He’d seen someone he was damn sure he knew. Dark hair against pale skin, and leather jacket over broad shoulders, body squared, braced for impact. It was a posture Stiles had seen countless times, most often standing between him and something that was trying to rip his throat out. For a fleeting second, amidst the screech of tires and the adrenaline flooding his system, Stiles could have sworn he’d seen Derek Hale standing in the middle of the road. Only that wasn't possible because Derek was dead, very, very dead.

entry.title: Demon on His Shoulders
entry.summary:
Author: Mekanamin02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,473Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 31

Summary: An unstoppable scream wrenches its way out of the demon as the feeling overpowers every sense in his body. He knows he’s gripping the woman’s arm too tightly, but he can’t seem to care when it feels like his core is igniting from within.Somewhere on the other side of the county, a boy gasps awake beside a hospital bed. There’s beeping behind him, loud, counting down. He sighs and stands, rolls his heavy shoulders and got to work, not realising he has a demon riding on his shoulders now. A demon his grandmother traded her life to protect him.**************Loner demon lord, Derek Hale just wants a quiet day to himself. One day, is all he asks. But one moment he's at home and the next he's standing in front of a frail old lady jumping to make a demon deal with him. He REALLY doesn't want to accept the deal but... circumstances. So now he's inserting himself into the life of a certain Stiles Stilinski to play his part but perhaps this will be a deal of Derek's millennia-long existence that he will never forget.

entry.title: How to train your alpha werewolf
entry.summary:
Author: everyonelovesLaurence

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,691Chapters: 8/29Kudos: 60

Summary: Derek Hale has always known two things about himself: He's not good at making people like him, and he's going to be his sister's second for the Sacramento pack. But when a random assignment leads him to be the new alpha of Beacon Hills, dealing with far too big shoes to fill and a new pack orphan that everyone listens to far more than they do him, he thinks it's his big chance to finally prove his worth to his mother. Besides, it's not forever, is it?Stiles Stilinski has always known two things about himself, too: Being the son of the alpha is a Big Job, and it's his to do, and one day, his mate will be the next alpha of his mother's pack. But when his parents are murdered, and some growly man with expressive eyebrows unwillingly takes her place, he's got two choices: keep glaring at Derek or teach him to man up. At least until he's found a replacement. How long could that take?This is a story about building a pack, finding a home and cuddling with a dog. It's mostly about the dog.

entry.title: Woodlands Cabin
entry.summary:
Author: Solinvictus22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,073Chapters: 14/14Kudos: 160

Summary: (FIXED AND EDITED)Don't get out of the cabin by the woodlands at night. Keep away from the guy in wolf mask lurking near the cabin, but sometimes he's the one who comes first especially to price worthy people as pure and innocent as Stiles. Will Stiles be able to escape the twisted fate he unwillingly fall unto or become one with the woodland forest where not even the light of day can find him.
